title: SMP IDENTIFICATION
content:
This looks like an altered trajan to me, however, not positive. Anyone have any ideas on this? (the logo SMP)  
 [http://www.smpstyle.com/usa/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019231524/http:/www.smpstyle.com/usa/index.html "http://www.smpstyle.com/usa/index.html")
author: bamaurer

comments.content:
This may sound crazy, but it looks like it could be a customized Optima (serifs added).

- Lex
